p.k: World War II drama. Anthony Steel stars as a British soldier who disappears while fighting in Libya. Donald Sinden plays his brother, who travels
Period melodrama with Kathleen Ryan. After a tough childhood, Esther is sent away to become a maid, but gets pregnant when seduced by a servant (Dirk Bogarde)
Western with Maureen O'Hara and James Stewart. With the help of a drifter, a woman strives to fulfil her dead husband's desire to introduce rare cattle
Classic version of Arthur Conan Doyle's scary Gothic mystery. Peter Cushing is Sherlock Holmes, investigating a chilling death on Dartmoor
Benedict Cumberbatch's Oscar-nominated role as Alan Turing, the socially awkward mathematician, WWII codebreaker, father of the modern computer and demonised homosexual

Violent sci-fi thriller with Chris Evans. Survivors from a global disaster take refuge on a train with a severely defined class system. But the oppressed will rebel. Strong language
Crime drama. Jakob Cedergren stars as a troubled cop confined to the office who finds himself in a race against time to help a distressed woman. Danish/subs. Strong language
